SEARCH

Package org.apache.lucene.codecs.hnsw

package org.apache.lucene.codecs.hnsw
HNSW vector helper classes. The classes in this package provide a scoring and storing mechanism for vectors stored in a flat file. This allows for HNSW formats to be extended with other flat storage formats or scoring without significant changes to the HNSW code. Some examples for scoring include ScalarQuantizedVectorScorer and DefaultFlatVectorScorer. Some examples for storing include Lucene99FlatVectorsFormat and Lucene99ScalarQuantizedVectorsFormat.
  • Related Packages

    Encodes/decodes per-document vectors and provides a scoring interface for the flat stored vectors
    FlatVectorsReader
    Reads vectors from an index.
    FlatVectorsScorer
    Provides mechanisms to score vectors that are stored in a flat file The purpose of this class is for providing flexibility to the codec utilizing the vectors
    FlatVectorsWriter
    Vectors' writer for a field that allows additional indexing logic to be implemented by the caller

    An interface that provides an HNSW graph.
